fixes.name: Date Sign
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR ParamEnd = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
VAR ParamStart = SELECTEDVALUE('Start Date'[Display As])
VAR EFFECTIVE_DATE = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE]
VAR MaxDateExclude = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude]
VAR MaxDateMinus1 = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day]
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        MaxDateExclude = EFFECTIVE_DATE,
        1,
        IF(MaxDateMinus1 = EFFECTIVE_DATE, -1, 0)
    ),
    IF(
        EFFECTIVE_DATE = ParamEnd,
        1,
        IF(EFFECTIVE_DATE = ParamStart, -1, 0)
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the nested IFs to DAX using VARs for clarity. Parameter references were replaced with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) as required. All column references were converted to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
